title: Looking For An ADC Duo Partner
body:
Hey

I'm a Silver 4 Support Main, looking for an ADC Partner to play ranked with. I currently play tanky supports like Leona and Thresh, but am learning other supports. If interested add "Shadeslayer808".

replies.body: Sorry guys, but I've decided to stop supporting. I'm now looking for jungle mains, since I've been playing a lot of mid/top. Sorry for any inconvenience.

Mate who are you trying to con?

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Shadeslayer808

IGN: Dwerer

Away from client but please do add :) I'd very much like a duo to hit gold with. ADC main
